Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The key is used as title of the resource type in the ADE "Add wizard" of the page editor and the "New" wizard from the workplace.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The key is used as title of the dialog that appears when creating a new resource of the type via the "New" wizard from the workplace.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The key is used as description of the resource type in the ADE "Add wizard" of the page editor and the "New" wizard from the workplace.
